text: Group A of the 2014 FIFA World Cup consisted of Brazil, Croatia, Mexico and Cameroon. Play began on 12 June and ended on 23 June 2014. ==Teams== Draw position Team Confederation Method of qualification Date of qualification Finals appearance Last appearance Previous best performance
